segments.text: I notice the line drawing style of this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight filters through the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress and apron works diligently on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, puddling widely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot already submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children plot their cookie heist nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the unstable stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is long, hand inside the labeled jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below pleads with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating so cutely, yet dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is idyllic, with fence and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about slips on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This routine day is teetering on disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
